2011 Earlier this week ''The X Factor''s Simon Cowell confessed that he is a ''massive fan of Paula Abdul .'' On Tuesday night Paula Abdul told Jay Leno that she felt that was an understatement. I think you need to take ''mass' off and put` obsessive,' said Paula Abdul when asked about her thoughts on Simon Cowell 's comment. The singer then clarified, ''He's obsessed with me.'' The 76ers never trailed over the last three quarters but played fast and loose with the lead until Allen Iverson took charge in the fourth quarter, when he scored 11 points. Allen Iverson got it going and http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_32pts_12asts_clutch_FT_vs_Grizzlies_NBA_07/08 Trailing by seven points with 3:12 left, the Denver Nuggets didn't panic. They made veteran plays. The Memphis Grizzlies were hurt by their youth. Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. ''This was a Yao Ming win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said. ''Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us. I Roy think a game like this is going to help us down the road.'' Elias Says Allen Iverson
